snippet: The Keystone XL pipeline should not be rushed through by lawmakers more worried about their political futures than the nation’s well-being.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congress for vote aimed at forcing the Obama administration to approve the Keystone XL oil pipeline; argues that move represents an ill-timed step backwards on climate change as Pres Obama makes strides on issue at G-20 summit meeting and in landmark agreement with China.
lead_paragraph: The Keystone XL pipeline should not be rushed through by lawmakers more worried about their political futures than the nation’s well-being.

headline.main: Playing Politics With Tar Sands Oil
headline.print_headline: Playing Politics With Tar Sands Oil
